info.title: forms
info.description: ðŸ“ Simple surveys and questionnaires, self-hosted

get.summary: Get all forms available to the user (owned/shared)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of forms to retrieve. Defaults to `owned`. Possible values: - `owned`: Forms owned by the user. - `shared`: Forms shared with the user.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Array containing the partial owned or shared forms

400.description: wrong form type supplied

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.summary: Create a new form and return the form Return a copy of the form if the parameter $fromId is set

fromId.description: (optional) Id of the form that should be cloned

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

403.description: The user is not allowed to create forms

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Read all information to edit a Form (form, questions, options, except submissions/answers)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the requested form

400.description: Could not find form

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Writes the given key-value pairs into Database

keyValuePairs.description: Array of key=>value pairs to update.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the updated form

400.description: Could not find new form owner

403.description: User is not allowed to modify the form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the deleted form

403.description: User is not allowed to delete the form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the questions of the given form

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

fromId.description: (optional) id of the question that should be cloned

parentQuestionId.description: (optional) id of the parent conditional question (for subquestions)

branchId.description: (optional) branch id within the parent conditional question

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: Datetime question type no longer supported

403.description: This form is archived and can not be modified

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Updates the Order of all Questions of a Form

newOrder.description: Array of Question-Ids in new order.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: Id of the form to reorder

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the question ids of the given form in the new order

400.description: One question has already been marked as deleted

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the requested question

400.description: Question doesn\'t belong to given Form

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Writes the given key-value pairs into Database Key `order` should only be changed by reorderQuestions() and is not allowed here

keyValuePairs.description: Array of key=>value pairs to update.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the updated question

400.description: Invalid extraSettings, will not update.

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the deleted question

400.description: Question doesn\'t belong to given Form

403.description: User has no permissions to get this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.summary: Add a new option to a question
post.description:
Returns a DataResponse containing the added options
This endpoint allows CORS requests

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: This question is not part ot the given form

403.description: Current user has no permission to edit

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Reorder options for a given question

newOrder.description: Array of option ids in new order.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the options of the question in the new order

400.description: This option is not part of the given question

403.description: Current user has no permission to edit

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Writes the given key-value pairs into Database
patch.description:
Returns the id of the updated option
This endpoint allows CORS requests

keyValuePairs.description: Array of key=>value pairs to update.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the updated option

400.description: The given option id doesn't match the question or form

403.description: Not allowed to update id or questionId

404.description: Could not find option or question

401.description: Current user is not logged in

delete.description:
Returns the id of the deleted option
This endpoint allows CORS requests

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the deleted option

400.description: The given option id doesn't match the question or form

403.description: Current user has no permission to edit

404.description: Could not find question or option

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Get all the submissions of a given form

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: (optional) A search query to filter submissions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) The maximum number of submissions to retrieve. Defaults to `null`

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (optional) The offset for pagination. Defaults to `0`

parameters.name: fileFormat
parameters.description: (optional) The file format that should be used for the download. Defaults to `null` Possible values: - `csv`: Comma-separated value - `ods`: OpenDocument Spreadsheet - `xlsx`: Excel Open XML Spreadsheet

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the submissions of the form

403.description: The current user has no permission to get the results for this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

delete.summary: Delete all submissions of a specified form

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the form id of the deleted submission

403.description: This form is not owned by the current user and user has no `results_delete` permission

401.description: Current user is not logged in

shareHash.description: public share-hash -> Necessary to submit on public link-shares.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: At least one submitted answer is not valid

403.description: This form is not owned by the current user and user has no `results_delete` permission

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the submissions of the form

400.description: Submission doesn't belong to given form

403.description: The current user has no permission to get this submission

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the updated submission

400.description: Can only update submission if allowEditSubmissions is set and the answers are valid

403.description: Can only update your own submission

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the deleted submission

400.description: Submission doesn't belong to given form

404.description: Could not find form or submission

403.description: This form is not owned by the current user and user has no `results_delete` permission

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the file name used for storing the submissions

403.description: The current user has no permission to get the results for this form

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.summary: Uploads a temporary files to the server during form filling

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the file id and name of the uploaded file

400.description: File type is not allowed

403.description: Already submitted

shareWith.description: ID of user/group/... to share with. For Empty shareWith and shareType Link, this will be set as RandomID.

permissions.description: the permissions granted on the share, defaults to `submit` Possible values: - `submit` user can submit - `results` user can see the results - `results_delete` user can see and delete results

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: Teams app is disabled

403.description: This form is not owned by the current user

401.description: Current user is not logged in

keyValuePairs.description: Array of key=>value pairs to update.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the updated share

400.description: Invalid permission given

403.description: Not allowed to update other properties than permissions

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: the id of the deleted share

400.description: Share doesn't belong to given Form

403.description: This form is not owned by the current user

401.description: Current user is not logged in
